hooks.prompt:
After web search/fetch, perform MANDATORY credibility triage:

REJECT if:
- Known misinformation domain or non-identifiable author/institution
- Commercial/promotional content posing as research

FLAG if:
- Preprint without peer review or blog/opinion piece
- Single-source claim

ACCEPT if:
- Peer-reviewed journal or institutional publication
- Primary source document

Output format: [ACCEPT/FLAG/REJECT] - [domain] - [reason]
